name: Subject 80
description:
Subject 80 is a 3D First Person Puzzle Game made in Algeria during the Game Zanga 9 Jam under the Parallel Universe theme by Jana Games Studios.

The game takes the player through some universes with reverse mechanisms and logic and mostly opposite to the player's common sense in search of key items awarded at the end of each Universe that offers the player access to new abilities and mechanisms that will help him in his short journey of dreams!
